title: Online Integrated Education Program for Enhancing Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and understanding of social studies core concepts
context.additional_context: Customized information evaluation and search competency enhancement program for pre-professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields, applying a blended tutorial approach combining video and interactive elements.

learning_goals: Learners evaluate online information sources by applying credibility, accuracy, and objectivity criteria with over 80% accuracy
Learners select appropriate keywords and search strategies for research topics to effectively retrieve materials from at least two reputable databases
Learners identify copyright and license types of information sources and create bibliographies following proper citation rules
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
